short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will automatically refresh your page when a new update has been pushed out and you are in full screen mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A companion extension for the Grow Dashboard application. Assists in the ability to show Grow dashboards on a TV.

This extension will: 

* Automatically reload your page when there is an update to the app.
* Automatically reload your page after 30 min so that the browser does not run out of memory.
